title: EnvProbeCache
description: Container environment variables cache file schema

^[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*$.description: Environment variable value (all env vars are strings in POSIX)

notes: Key format: Environment variable name (typically uppercase with underscores)
Value format: String (all environment variables are strings)
Lifecycle: Created on first probe, read on subsequent probes, invalidated on container rebuild
